alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson County; Yuma (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 10 at 1:49PM MDT until October 11 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 8 PM MDT TUESDAY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 001, 002, 013, 079, 080, 081, 252, AND 253... The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a Red Flag Warning which is in effect from 9 AM to 8 PM MDT Tuesday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect as it has been upgraded. * Affected Area...In Colorado, Fire Weather Zone 252 Yuma and Fire Weather Zone 253 Kit Carson. In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 001 Cheyenne, Fire Weather Zone 002 Rawlins and Fire Weather Zone 013 Sherman. In Nebraska, Fire Weather Zone 079 Dundy, Fire Weather Zone 080 Hitchcock and Fire Weather Zone 081 Red Willow. * Winds...Northwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 11 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised. * Additional Details... A cold front is expected to move through during the late afternoon/early evening. Winds will suddenly increase and shift to out of the north as the front passes.
info.instruction: Avoid burning or creating sparks. If a fire starts, putting it out will be more difficult due to strong wind speeds and changing directions.
